title: Splurging to Domestic Abuse
itunes:title: Splurging to Domestic Abuse
description:
Tuesday 4/4- Today on the show after Angela Yee confessed on spending almost $1,300 on a phone case we had to open the phone lines to see if any of our listeners had the urge to splurge themselves. Also, after a rumor report about former member of the Spice Girls Mel B, opened up about her experiencing domestic abuse from her ex, we opened up the phone lines for our listeners to voice their experience on any domestic abuse they experienced. Moreover, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to the Sanford police department.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
